title: Sri Lanka’s threats to Journalists – the Paul Harris episode
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – In November 2002, a writer and military analyst working in Sri Lanka between 1996 and 2002 as special correspondent for Jane’s Intelligence Review and the London Daily Telegraph was given 24 hours notice by the Ranil Wickremasinghe Government to leave the country. The reason for his cancelation of visa…
